channel.title: When i download a file using KeyAuth's api , it says 'Value cannot be null. Parameter name: bytes'

item.title: When i download a file using KeyAuth's api , it says 'Value cannot be null. Parameter name: bytes'
item.dc:creator: lIMonkieIl
item.description:
Thats because for some reason the the response is null most of the time us because the file is to big or the file id is wrong
So just do after the keyauthapp.download()
Log the response for now just to see what it is.

So do

Console.writeline(KeyAuthApp.response.success)
Console.writeline(KeyAuthApp.response.message)

Read full topic
